actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a deduction for blood donations, and to allow an individual to take such a deduction whether or not he itemizes his deductions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for donations of blood equal to $25 for each pint donated.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a deduction for blood donations, and to allow an individual to take such a deduction whether or not he itemizes his deductions.
